attributes.additional_details: Only the BBC benefits from a the licence fee, either all broadcasters should benefit or the fee should go to the Government as this is fair to all and online with other countries.
attributes.background: why should the British public continue to pay a draconian licence fee for BBC Channel's when the rest of the world can access them for free? Instead the British public should only pay for a TV licence allowing each household up to 5 TV sets and the money go to the Government not the BBC.

rejection.details:
If you would like the TV licence to be abolished, you might like to sign and share this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300118
